name: Sword Name Generator
description: Craft legendary names for your blades! Unleash the power of imagination and forge monikers worthy of gods and heroes. Stop calling your sword 'Stabby' – it deserves better!
introduction: Is your sword feeling a little…nameless? Does it yearn for a title that strikes fear into the hearts of your enemies (or at least sounds cool when you're swinging it around in your backyard)? Then you've come to the right place! Our Sword Name Generator will bestow upon your weapon a moniker of epic proportions. Prepare for glory!
howToUse: Behold! A name worthy of legend appears.
Don't like it? Click again! We've got enough names to arm an entire army.
Copy and paste your favorite name. Tell everyone your sword's name. Become a legend.
Repeat until you find the perfect name. No judgment if you spend all day doing this.

faqs.question: Will this generator actually make my sword sharper?
faqs.answer: Sadly, no. But it WILL make it sound a whole lot more intimidating. Think of it as a psychological edge.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for other things besides swords?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Use them for your pet hamster, your fantasy football team, or your secret lair. The possibilities are endless!

faqs.question: Are the names historically accurate?
faqs.answer: Some might be inspired by historical blades, but mostly, we're going for awesome. Historical accuracy is for history books, not sword fights (or backyard swinging).

faqs.question: My sword is already named. Should I still use this?
faqs.answer: Definitely! You can never have too many names for your sword. Consider it a middle name. Or a cool nickname.

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Keep hitting that 'Generate' button! We've got a virtually infinite supply of names. Or, get creative and mix and match prefixes and suffixes to create your own masterpiece!

faqs.question: Can I suggest names to add to the generator?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your suggestions! Send them our way, and we might just add them to the generator. Help us make it even more epic!
